name: Thai Cucumber Salad
author: camp0433
summary: This sweet and tangy summer salad of cucumber, cilantro, and peanuts with just a hint of heat is always a hit at picnics and potlucks since it doesn't need to be refrigerated and you're pretty much guaranteed to be the only one bringing this dish!
ingredients: 3 large cucumbers, peeled, halved lengthwise, seeded, and cut into 1/4-inch slices
directions: Toss the cucumbers with the salt in a colander, and leave in the sink to drain for 30 minutes
Rinse with cold water, then drain and pat dry with paper towels
Whisk together the sugar and vinegar in a mixing bowl until the sugar has dissolved
Add the cucumbers, jalapeno peppers, and cilantro; toss to combine
Sprinkle chopped peanuts on top before serving
